mapper.update: update biz_link set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, origin = #{origin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, url, description, img, email, qq, `status`, origin, remark, create_time, update_time from biz_link where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, `name`, url, description, img, email, qq, `status`, origin, remark, create_time, update_time from biz_link
